About Me

With over a decade of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in creating scalable web applications and innovative solutions that drive business growth.

My expertise spans from frontend technologies like React and Next.js to backend systems using Node.js and cloud infrastructure on AWS. I'm passionate about mentoring junior developers and staying at the forefront of web technology.

Based in the Philippines, I work remotely with teams worldwide, bringing technical excellence and creative problem-solving to every project.
